Uses of Class
com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.cors.CorsServiceBuilder

  • Packages that use CorsServiceBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.cors
    Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) support.

    • Uses of CorsServiceBuilder in com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.cors

      Methods in com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.cors that return CorsServiceBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.allowCredentials()
      By default cookies are not included in CORS requests, but this method will enable cookies to be added to CORS requests.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.allowNullOrigin()
      Web browsers may set the 'Origin' request header to 'null' if a resource is loaded from the local file system.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.allowRequestHeaders(AsciiString... headers)
      Specifies the if headers that should be returned in the CORS 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers' response header.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.allowRequestHeaders(String... headers)
      Specifies the if headers that should be returned in the CORS 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers' response header.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.allowRequestMethods(HttpMethod... methods)
      Specifies the allowed set of HTTP Request Methods that should be returned in the CORS 'Access-Control-Request-Method' response header.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.disablePreflightResponseHeaders()
      Specifies that no preflight response headers should be added to a preflight response.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.exposeHeaders(AsciiString... headers)
      Specifies the headers to be exposed to calling clients.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.exposeHeaders(String... headers)
      Specifies the headers to be exposed to calling clients.
      static CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.forAnyOrigin()
      Creates a new builder with its origin set to '*'.
      static CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.forOrigin(String origin)
      Creates a new builder with the specified origin.
      static CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.forOrigins(String... origins)
      Creates a new builder with the specified origins.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.maxAge(long maxAge)
      When making a preflight request the client has to perform two request with can be inefficient.
      <T> CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.preflightResponseHeader(AsciiString name, Iterable<T> values)
      Returns HTTP response headers that should be added to a CORS preflight response.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.preflightResponseHeader(AsciiString name, Object... values)
      Returns HTTP response headers that should be added to a CORS preflight response.
      <T> CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.preflightResponseHeader(AsciiString name, Supplier<T> valueSupplier)
      Returns HTTP response headers that should be added to a CORS preflight response.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.preflightResponseHeader(String name, Object... values)
      Returns HTTP response headers that should be added to a CORS preflight response.
      CorsServiceBuilder CorsServiceBuilder.shortCircuit()
      Specifies that a CORS request should be rejected if it's invalid before being further processing.
